a28.value: Yondar.me started out as a centralized web2 PWA, but go.yondar.me is our new decentralized version of Yondar built on the nostr protocol!

a28-1.value: Once go.yondar.me reaches feature parity with yondar.me, we will shut down the old Yondar and replace it with the new nostr-powered Yondar! Nostr is the future and we are excited to be a part of it! ğŸš€
